Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for character skeleton and foot inverse kinematics .

neckTurnGain.Wiki: The amount of gain for neck turning. The higher the value, the faster it turns.

minAnkleHeightMS.Wiki: The minimum height at which the ankle can be raised. In metres.

maxAnkleHeightMS.Wiki: The maximum height at which the ankle can be raised. In metres.

cosineMaxKneeAngle.Wiki: Maximum angle at which the knee can be bent (cosine value). In degrees.

cosineMinKneeAngle.Wiki: Minimum angle at which the knee can be bent (cosine value). In degrees.

footPlantedAnkleHeightMS.Wiki: If the ankle is lower than this height, assume they are together. In centimetres.

footRaisedAnkleHeightMS.Wiki: If the ankle is higher than this height, assume they are apart. In centimetres.

raycastDistanceUp.Wiki: The distance above the ankle at which the raycast occurs. In centimetres.

raycastDistanceDown.Wiki: The distance below the ankle at which the raycast occurs. In centimetres.

onOffGain.Wiki: Determines the amount of gain applied when IK is toggled on and off.

groundAscendingGain.Wiki: Determines the amount of gain applied when the ground height increases.

groundDescendingGain.Wiki: Determines the amount of gain applied when the ground height decreases.

footRaisedGain.Wiki: Determines the amount of gain applied when a foot is raised.

footPlantedGain.Wiki: Determines the amount of gain applied when a foot is planted to the ground.

footUnlockGain.Wiki: Determines the amount of gain applied when a foot is locked or unlocked.

kneeAxisType.Wiki: The axial direction of the knee to use.

useFootLocking.Wiki: If ON, feet and ankles will be locked.

footPlacementOn.Wiki: If ON, foot placement is active.

twistKneeAxisType.Wiki: Axial direction that ignores rotation of the knee joint for twisting.

neckTurnPriority.Wiki: The lower it is, the faster it will turn. -1 does not turn the head.

neckTurnMaxAngle.Wiki: The maximum rotation angle for this joint. Can't bend beyond this angle.
